ğŸ² Time to start the crockpot!

1. Season chicken with salt & pepper
2. Layer chicken in crockpot
3. Pour entire bottle of BWW Parmesan Garlic sauce over chicken
4. Add milk to empty bottle, shake, pour over chicken
5. Add cream cheese cubes + parmesan
6. Cook on HIGH 2-3hrs or LOW 3-4hrs
